tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE retention_strategies (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  retention_group TEXT,
  sign_up_date DATE,
  last_activity_date DATE,
  conversion_status TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE test_results (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  test_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  conversion_status BOOLEAN,
  test_duration INTERVAL
);

CREATE TABLE user_data (
   user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   strategy_id INT,
   signup_date DATE NOT NULL,
   retention_status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'active',
   FOREIGN KEY (strategy_id) REFERENCES retention_strategy(strategy_id)
);

CREATE TABLE test_results (
   result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   user_id INT,
   strategy_id INT,
   test_group INT,
   conversion_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   test_completion_date DATE,
   FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_data(user_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (strategy_id) REFERENCES retention_strategy(strategy_id)
);

CREATE TABLE retention_strategy (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_group INT,
    retention_rate FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE experiment_results (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_group INT,
    conversion_rate FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE user_data (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE experiment_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    experiment_group INT,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
